title: Exporting multiple files with the same file name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce: 1. Launch WSWB and create two projects

Observed behavior: (OB)

Expected behavior: (EB)

Steps to reproduce: (SR)

Under each project, create a new file with the same name, such as 'foo.txt'.

OB: When trying to export the projects to a zip file by selecting File > Export > Zip File, the export fails.

EB: The zip file should be successfully created, containing all the files within the projects, including those with the same file name but under different directories.

SR: 

1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name, such as 'foo.txt'
3. From the main menu, select File > Export > Zip File to export the projects
4. Observe that the zip file is not created or an error occurs during the export
